original_text: “Six of the towns you give the Levites will be cities of refuge, to which a person who has killed someone may flee. In addition, give them forty-two other towns.
korean_text: 너희가 레위인에게 줄 성읍은 살인자들이 피하게 할 도피성으로 여섯 성읍이요 그 외에 사십이 성읍이라

sentences.original_text: Six of the towns you give the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 레위 사람에게 줄 여섯 도시는

sentences.original_text: to which a person who has killed someone may flee.
sentences.korean_translation: 살인한 사람이 도망쳐 갈 수 있는 곳
